entries.content: Objections are just information requests, not rejections.
entries.notes: Emphasizes reframing objections as opportunities to provide more information.

entries.content: Prospect says they're not looking into vials now but will in the next year. Sales agent treats this as a future opportunity rather than a rejection.
entries.notes: Demonstrates handling a timing objection by planning follow-up.

entries.content: Ask 'why' to understand the prospect's future plans when they give a timing objection.
entries.notes: Used to gather more information and position for future opportunities.

entries.content: Would you be opposed to doing a cost comparison to see how much we might be able to save your team?
entries.notes: Phrasing that treats potential objections as simple information requests.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
